snippet: Members of the House of Representatives voted on Friday to protect their office expense accounts from further budget cuts.
abstract: Members of the House of Representatives vote to protect their office expense accounts from further budget cuts; the vote comes on a $3.3 million measure financing Congressional operations for the 2013 fiscal year.
lead_paragraph: Members of the House of Representatives voted on Friday to protect their office expense accounts from further budget cuts.

headline.seo: House Votes to Protect 2013 Budgets for Its Offices
headline.main: House Votes to Protect 2013 Budgets for Its Offices
headline.print_headline: House Votes To Protect 2013 Budgets For Its Offices
